jobTitle: Product Marketing Manager, TomTom Maps - San Francisco Bay
jobDescription: What if we told you that you can achieve more at TomTom in less time than at any other company? From developing the next product revolution, to marketing and selling it, we always want inspired people to join us! Where do you want to be? TomTom Maps is a leading provider of global map and traffic data sourced from a community of over 550 million connected devices. We offer a platform of cloud-based products allowing customers an easy access to TomTom Maps data and software components to create location-enabled applications and services. Our customer base ranges from application developers to internet-of-things companies, logistics services and fleet management experts, enterprises, system integrators, governments, and cloud services providers.  We are looking for an experienced, exceptional and results driven Product Marketing Manager to create winning propositions for our data and software products. As a key contributor to the growth of our business, you will work on a wide variety of software and data licensing opportunities to gather the related customer and market requirements that drive our investments and new product development. In this role, you will interface with customers, sales, marketing, product management and engineering teams to manage the product value proposition creation and new product introductions. The right person for this role has a solid knowledge in product and proposition development with hands-on experience in new data and software product introductions.
